main.name: Pablo González
main.description: ✰ RockStar Developer ✰ with more than 6 years of experience creating innovation in BackEnd/FrontEnd/Mobile Software with multiple technologies to solve any problem
main.bio: I am a Software Engineer (+6 years) of experience developing software with technologies such as: ReactJS, NodeJS, Django/Python, Ruby on Rails, Ionic, AngularJS, JavaScript, PHP, JQuery, AWS Lambda, AWS EC2, AWS S3, AWS Alexa, ElasticSearch, DynamoDB, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, Redis, CSS3, GIT. Another Skills: Stripe, Unit Test, Paypal, Conekta, Swagger, Material, Bootstrap, HTML5, SasS, Less.
main.contactmessage: Contact to me if you have any question.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
